abstracts.cdata!:
The Capital Market Development Technical
            Assistance Project (CMTAP) facilitates the implementation of
            the Capital Market Development Project. In particular, it
            supports: 1) the institutional strengthening of the
            securities market regulatory agency and reinforcement of
            securities market regulations, including designing a
            restructuring program, preparing business plans, installing
            computer systems, and evaluating trends and preparing
            proposals; 2) the implementation of new pension reform
            legislation and creation of a supervisory agency for pension
            funds; and 3) the early establishment of advanced programs
            to improve local banking skills for term financing of
            investment projects, including financing training programs
            by the private sector; and 4) improving the institutional
            framework for project implementation by adding staff support.
